thread.section_title: Mazuma Mobile Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mazuma Mobile Australia | mazumamobile.com.au
thread.title: James
thread.title_full: Mazuma Mobile Australia reviewed by James

author: James
title: James
text: The process was fast and efficient. I originally sent my phone in only to find out the screen I had replaced was not working properly. Mazuma contacted me to let me know the price they offered would be reduced or they could send the phone back, the option I chose. I had the phone repaired and sent it back receiving the value originally Quote: d. In all, I would recommend Mazuma.
